title: smallcase - Software Development Engineer - Test - Manual & Automation Testing
description:
**Description**
 As an SDET at smallcase, you will play a critical role in ensuring the quality, stability, and performance of our products.
   

  

 You will design robust automation frameworks, contribute to API automation, and collaborate closely with engineers to deliver high\\-quality releases.
   

  

 A strong foundation in mobile automation (Appium), API testing, and familiarity with performance testing will be key to success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and automate test plans for major components, feature sets, or mid\\-sized Build and enhance mobile automation suites using Appium(Java experience preferred).
* Develop maintainable, reusable, API\\-driven automation using tools such as RestAssured, Postman/Newman, or similar.
* Ensure automation follows best practices, coding standards, and scalable design principles.
* Execute both automated and manual tests to validate functionality, performance, and reliability.
* Build automation frameworks from scratch and improve existing frameworks for scalability and robustness.
* Analyse requirements, identify test gaps, and propose improvements in test coverage and reliability.
* Perform API\\-level testing, validating functional flows, schema validations, contract testing, and integration scenarios.
* Contribute to CI/CD pipelines by integrating test suites and ensuring smooth deployment workflows.
* Troubleshoot failures, analyse logs, identify root causes, and work with engineering teams to drive resolutions.
* Participate in design and code reviews, ensuring high testability and quality throughout the development lifecycle.
* Collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and designers to maintain high\\-quality standards.
* Facilitate technical discussions, resolve disagreements constructively, and drive decision\\-making.
* Mentor junior QA/SDET team members on product knowledge, testing approaches, automation strategies, and best practices.
* Help onboard new team members and contribute to documentation and knowledge\\-sharing sessions.


**Requirements**
* 3\\-5 years of experience in QA/SDET roles with strong exposure to SDLC and STLC.
* Strong hands\\-on experience in mobile automation using Solid experience with API automation and testing tools such as RestAssured, Postman.
* Strong manual testing foundation and understanding of exploratory testing approaches.
* Experience building or enhancing automation frameworks from scratch.
* Good understanding of REST APIs, MongoDB, Redis, browser developer tools, and debugging utilities.
* Exposure to performance testing tools (JMeter, k6 Locust) is a strong plus.
* Experience working in Agile/Scrum teams.
* Prior experience in small teams or startup environments is a plus.
* Strong communication, problem\\-solving, and analytical thinking skills.

description:

 Perimattic specializes in providing comprehensive technology solutions, offering services such as data science, AI development, full\\-stack development, and web development.  This is a full\\-time hybrid role for a Junior Embedded Systems Engineer, located in Jaipur, with flexibility for some work\\-from\\-home arrangements. The role involves designing, developing, and testing embedded systems, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and working on Internet of Things (IoT) projects. title: Staff Engineer, Data Science
description:
**Company Description**
**üëãüèº** 
**We're Nagarro.**
 We are a Digital Product Engineering company that is scaling in a big way! We build products, services, and experiences that inspire, excite, and delight. We work at scale across all devices and digital mediums, and our people exist everywhere in the world (17500\\+ experts across 39 countries, to be exact). Our work culture is dynamic and non\\-hierarchical. We're looking for great new colleagues. That's where you come in!
   

  

**Job Description**
**REQUIREMENTS:**
* Must have experience in Machine Learning Fundamentals, Data Analysis \\& Visualization, Statistics \\& Probability, SQL, Model Packaging \\& Deployment.
* Must have hands on generative AI fundamental, RAG, text to SQL.
* Should have experience in Python or R for Data Science.
* Should have experience in Classification\\-regression, Forecasting ,Anomaly detection, Market mix model, Predictive analysis, Unsupervised Models, Recommendation Systems, Natural Language processing \\& Optimization.
* Should have experience in Data science on AWS/Azure/GCP.
* Should have experience in creating ML pipelines using Airflow
* Must have exposure in model deployment using docker/Kubernetes.
* Strong troubleshooting skills in different disparate technologies and environments.
* Should be enthusiastic about different areas of work and exploring new technologies.
* Should have clarity of thought and strong communication skills to effectively pitch solutions.
* Must have ability to explore and grasp new technologies.
* Must be capable of mentoring team members in projects and helping them keep up with new technologies.
* Should be empowering the team members to be solution providers and enable a flat environment where everyone‚Äôs point of view is considered, and feedback is encouraged.


**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
* Writing and reviewing great quality code
* Understanding the client‚Äôs business use cases and technical requirements and be able to convert them into technical design which elegantly meets the requirements.
* Mapping decisions with requirements and be able to translate the same to developers.
* Identifying different solutions and being able to narrow down the best option that meets the client‚Äôs requirements.
* Defining guidelines and benchmarks for NFR considerations during project implementation
* Writing and reviewing design document explaining overall architecture, framework, and high\\-level design of the application for the developers
* Reviewing architecture and design on various aspects like extensibility, scalability, security, design patterns, user experience, NFRs, etc., and ensure that all relevant best practices are followed.
* Developing and designing the overall solution for defined functional and non\\-functional requirements; and defining technologies, patterns, and frameworks to materialize it.
* Understanding and relating technology integration scenarios and applying these learnings in projects
* Resolving issues that are raised during code/review, through exhaustive systematic analysis of the root cause, and being able to justify the decision taken.
* Carrying out POCs to make sure that suggested design/technologies meet the requirements.
* Should be open to travel onsite once a month.


**Qualifications**
 Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

title: MCO - Software Engineer - Backend Development
description:
**Description**
 MCO provides compliance management software that enables companies worldwide to reduce their misconduct risk. The My Compliance Office platform lets compliance professionals demonstrate they are proactively managing the regulated activities of employees, third\\-party vendors, and other firm agents. Available as a unified suite or a la carte, our easy\\-to\\-use and extensible SaaS\\-based solutions get clients up and running quickly and cost\\-efficiently.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Function :** 
 Software Engineering \\- Backend Development
   

  

 Java Hibernate J2EE Spring
   

  

 This role is essential for product development. The role is responsible for ensuring the effective and efficient development of applications and quality deliverables.
   

  

**Requirements**
 In this senior position, you'll design, code and test software. You will develop transactional application modules (JSP, EJB, etc. ), applying standards for programming, naming, security and performance. You provide proper code documentation and implement configuration changes to packaged software applications to meet business requirements. Additionally, you document and assist in defining requirements, creating documents to ensure the applications meet their expectations. You maintain and repair applications to keep them performing in accordance with technical and functional :
   

  

 The developer is responsible for a robust and efficient implementation.
   

  

* Participates in and leads software design meetings and analyses user needs to determine technical requirements.
* Collaborates with team members and across groups to prepare technical specifications.
* Designs and develops high\\-quality code.
* Tests, debugs, analyses, and fixes application problems/issues.
* Works closely with stakeholders to fix issues in a timely fashion.
* Follows the software development lifecycle process.
* Suggests and implements techniques for software or development process improvements.
* Participates in code reviews in accordance with program specifications and coding standards, practices and conventions, new designs, changes, and enhancements.
* Provides direction to less skilled employees.
* May design and implement training plans.
* Interacts with internal and/or external stakeholders to support product releases and/or resolve program problems.
* Research and remain informed of new technology and development tools.


**Requirements**
* Must have a strong working knowledge of developing, designing, and implementing large\\-scale enterprise applications using Java and J2EE technologies.
* Min 3\\-5 years of IT experience as a Software Engineer or Developer.
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
* Working knowledge of source tools (Git, Jenkins, Sonar, Artifactory ) master of major programming language (Java), Front end : HTML/CSS, java script, angular, react, responsive design, Back end : Java, spring framework, RESTful APIs, DB : SQL and NoSQL, Version Control : GIT, DevOps Security : authentication and authorization, OWASP. Interest in Front\\-end languages and frameworks (JavaScript / Angular or React).
* Must have hands\\-on experience with Angular or above.
* Good experience with Spring Boot, API, and JPA.
* Understanding of AngularJS is good to have.
* Experience with databases and ORM frameworks (eg, Hibernate)
* Work with JBoss EAP and Oracle EE Databases.
* Ability and interest to learn new languages and technology stack.
* Autonomous, rigorous and team spirit skills.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Overview**
 The role involves leading a smaller squad within the wider software engineering function, responsible for the development, enhancement, management, maintenance, and integration of the company‚Äôs systems and applications. You will work as part of the overall software engineering team, collaborating closely with other business units to design new systems or enhance existing ones in line with evolving business requirements.
   

  

 Key responsibilities include adherence to agile methodologies and principles, ensuring efficient and iterative delivery. Additionally, the role includes mentoring new team members and providing technical guidance to support their onboarding and professional development.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Lead the development of key GoFibre business systems working with the Head of Software Engineering
   

  

* Collaborate across the wider technology function on the strategic system direction balancing in house and purchased solutions to maximise operation effectiveness.
* Direct people management responsibility and providing mentorship and support to team members. Setting clear goals and expectations for individual team members and the team as a whole.
* Designing, developing, and implementing software solutions, often leading the technical design and architecture discussions.
* Responsible for development and maintenance of integration between internal systems
* Design and development of other software working with the Head of Software Engineering
* Responsible for regularly updating the leadership team on projects, owning \\& escalating issues with arise through to resolution
* Creation of efficient and accurate detailed technical documentation
* Contributing to design and technical decisions within the team
* Responsible for performing code reviews
* Be the role model in quality documentation development to align with in team working practices
* Lead and participate in Agile development processes, including sprint planning, stand\\-ups, and retrospectives.
* No budget responsibilities with FTE, but minimisation of the operational overhead as part of solution developed.


 Mentoring: Coaches junior and mid\\-level engineers, sharing knowledge and best practices.
   

  

* People Leadership: Being a great boss, inspiring your team to perform at their best
* Problem Solving: Tackles complex technical challenges with innovative solutions.
* Code Reviews: Provides constructive, insightful feedback to improve team output
* Cross\\-Functional Collaboration: Works effectively with team colleagues, stakeholders and third party contractors.
* Clear Communication: Explains complex technical concepts to non\\-technical audiences.
* Conflict Resolution: Navigates disagreements constructively and diplomatically.
* End\\-to\\-End Ownership: Takes responsibility for the full lifecycle of features or systems.
* Proactive Attitude: Identifies areas for improvement and drives change without being asked.
* Reliability: Delivers consistently and meets commitments.
* Long\\-Term Vision: Aligns technical decisions with business goals and future scalability.
* Risk Management: Anticipates potential issues and mitigates them early.
* Innovation: Brings new ideas and evaluates emerging technologies for potential adoption.


**Requirements**
 Minimum of 5 years professional experience of python or C\\#/ Dynamics/ Vue development
   

  

**Professional Experience Of PostgresSQL Or Other SQL Databases**
 CI/CD experience, preferably with Gitlab
   

  

 Experience of building and interacting with APIs
   

  

 Experience in Agile tooling, like JIRA \\& Confluence
   

  

 GIT Experience
   

  

 Software Design \\& Architecture
   

  

 System Design: Ability to design scalable, maintainable, and secure systems.
   

  

 Design Patterns: Proficient in applying appropriate patterns to solve architectural problems.
   

  

 API Design: Creates intuitive, robust, and well\\-documented APIs.
   

  

 Programming \\& Development
   

  

 Language Mastery: Deep expertise in one or more core languages (e.g., Python, C\\#, JavaScript). Microsoft Dynamics knowledge required.
   

  

 Code Quality: Writes clean, efficient, and testable code.
   

  

 Testing: Implements unit, integration, and end\\-to\\-end tests using modern frameworks.
   

  

 Tooling \\& Productivity
   

  

 Version Control: Expert in Git workflows (e.g., GitFlow, trunk\\-based development).
   

  

 IDEs \\& Debugging: Efficient with development environments and debugging tools.
   

  

 Package Management: Manages dependencies and builds using tools like npm, pip, Maven, etc.

title: Backend Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Uplevyl is a forward\\-thinking organization dedicated to creating impactful technological solutions that promote equity and opportunity. Our mission is to harness the power of AI and innovative engineering to address systemic gaps faced by women and underserved communities. We are committed to building a diverse, inclusive, and dynamic environment where talented individuals can thrive and contribute to meaningful societal change. At Uplevyl, we prioritize purpose\\-driven work, high standards, and rapid innovation to deliver products that open doors and expand possibilities for all.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Node.js (Nest.js) Backend Engineer to join our talented engineering team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable backend services for our large\\-scale, multi\\-tenant SaaS applications. Your expertise will help shape the architecture of our systems, ensuring they are robust, secure, and capable of supporting our mission\\-driven initiatives. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work at the intersection of technology and social impact, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions that empower women and organizations worldwide.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will have over five years of experience in backend development, with a strong focus on Node.js and Nest.js frameworks. You should possess excellent programming, debugging, and problem\\-solving skills, along with hands\\-on experience building both GraphQL and REST APIs. Deep knowledge of relational databases such as PostgreSQL and MySQL, as well as NoSQL databases like MongoDB or DynamoDB, is essential. Familiarity with microservices architecture, containerization using Docker and Kubernetes, and cloud services on AWS (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3, Cognito) is required. Experience with event\\-driven systems like Kafka or RabbitMQ, along with understanding of clean and hexagonal architecture and software design patterns, will be highly valued. Candidates with exposure to AI models, API integrations, or model orchestration will have a distinct advantage. We seek self\\-driven, innovative professionals who thrive in collaborative environments and are committed to continuous learning and improvement.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a Senior Backend Engineer at Uplevyl, your responsibilities will include designing, building, and maintaining high\\-performance backend services for our SaaS platform. You will develop scalable REST and GraphQL APIs, optimize database schemas, and ensure system reliability and security. You will architect and deploy microservices using Docker and Kubernetes, implement event\\-driven systems with Kafka, RabbitMQ, or Kinesis, and utilize AWS cloud services to build secure, scalable infrastructure. Applying principles of Clean Architecture and Hexagonal Architecture, you will create maintainable, testable code and implement observability through logging, metrics, and distributed tracing. Additionally, you will improve CI/CD pipelines, automate deployment processes, and conduct thorough code reviews to uphold high standards of quality, security, and performance. Collaboration with frontend, mobile, and AI teams to deliver integrated features is also a key aspect of your role. You will proactively identify system bottlenecks, make architectural decisions, and contribute to the continuous enhancement of engineering practices across the organization.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Uplevyl offers a competitive and comprehensive benefits package designed to support our team members' well\\-being and professional growth. We provide flexible work arrangements, including remote work options, to promote work\\-life balance. Our benefits include health, dental, and vision insurance, generous paid time off, and opportunities for continuous learning and development. Employees have access to a collaborative and inclusive work environment that encourages innovation and ownership. We also offer performance\\-based incentives and recognition programs to reward excellence. At Uplevyl, you will be part of a mission\\-driven organization that values your contributions and supports your career advancement in a dynamic, purpose\\-focused setting.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Uplevyl is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where diverse perspectives and backgrounds are valued and respected. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. Our hiring practices are designed to ensure fairness and equal opportunity for all applicants and employees. We believe that a diverse team enhances innovation and drives our mission to create impactful solutions that benefit society at large.

title: Full Stack Trainer in Panipat
description:
We are hiring a hands\\-on Full Stack Web Development Trainer who can teach by building. This role demands strong practical knowledge, live coding ability, and real\\-world project mentoring. Pure theory trainers should not apply.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Deliver structured classroom \\& lab\\-based training
* Conduct live coding, debugging, and walkthrough sessions
* Train students on end\\-to\\-end full\\-stack projects
* Mentor students on Git\\-based collaborative projects
* Guide deployment workflows (basic CI/CD understanding)
* Create assignments, evaluations, and capstone projects
* Align training with industry hiring expectations


**Tech Stack Requirements (Mandatory)**
* Frontend:
* HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6\\+)
* React.js
* Next.js (routing, SSR/SSG, App Router basics)
* Responsive design and API integration
* Backend:
* Node.js and Express.js
* RESTful APIs
* Authentication and authorization (JWT, role\\-based access)
* Databases \\& Backend Services:
* MongoDB (Mongoose)
* Supabase (auth, database, storage, APIs)
* Basic SQL understanding (preferred)
* Stacks:
* MERN Stack (mandatory)
* Version Control \\& Collaboration (mandatory):
* Strong command over Git
* GitHub workflows (branching, PRs, merges, conflict resolution)
* Code reviews and collaborative development practice

title: Software Engineer III - Java, React
description:
**Job Description**
 We have an exciting and rewarding opportunity for you to take your software engineering career to the next level.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer III at JPMorgan Chase within the Asset \\& Wealth Management, you serve as a seasoned member of an agile team to design and deliver trusted market\\-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. You are responsible for carrying out critical technology solutions across multiple technical areas within various business functions in support of the firm‚Äôs business objectives.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Executes software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting with ability to think beyond routine or conventional approaches to build solutions or break down technical problems
* Creates secure and high\\-quality production code and maintains algorithms that run synchronously with appropriate systems
* Produces architecture and design artifacts for complex applications while being accountable for ensuring design constraints are met by software code development
* Gathers, analyzes, synthesizes, and develops visualizations and reporting from large, diverse data sets in service of continuous improvement of software applications and systems
* Proactively identifies hidden problems and patterns in data and uses these insights to drive improvements to coding hygiene and system architecture
* Contributes to software engineering communities of practice and events that explore new and emerging technologies

**Required Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**

* Good exposure to building Reactjs frontend components

title: NodeJs Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Persistent Systems is a global leader in technology services and software solutions, dedicated to helping organizations across various industries innovate and transform their digital landscape. With a strong focus on delivering high\\-quality solutions, Persistent Systems has established a reputation for excellence in areas such as cloud computing, application development, data analytics, and enterprise modernization. The company prides itself on fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment that encourages continuous learning and growth. Persistent Systems values innovation, integrity, and customer\\-centricity, making it an ideal place for talented professionals to build their careers and contribute to impactful projects worldwide.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled Node.js Production Support Engineer to join our dynamic team at Persistent Systems. In this role, you will be responsible for managing and supporting our mission\\-critical Node.js applications in a production environment. Your primary focus will be on ensuring system stability, optimizing performance, and providing prompt resolution to any issues that arise. You will work closely with development teams to deploy updates, troubleshoot complex problems, and implement enhancements that improve overall system reliability. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work with cutting\\-edge technologies such as Kubernetes and cloud platforms, contributing to the seamless operation of our enterprise applications. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in Node.js support, strong problem\\-solving skills, and the ability to thrive in a fast\\-paced environment.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a minimum of 4 years of experience in Node.js development or support, demonstrating a deep understanding of application lifecycle management in production settings. A strong knowledge of container orchestration tools, particularly Kubernetes, is essential. Familiarity with microservices architecture and cloud environments such as AWS, Azure, or GCP will be highly advantageous. Candidates should have hands\\-on experience with monitoring and incident management tools, enabling quick diagnosis and resolution of issues. Excellent communication skills, a proactive approach to problem\\-solving, and the ability to work collaboratively within cross\\-functional teams are critical. A degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a Node.js Production Support Engineer, your responsibilities will include providing ongoing support for Node.js applications in a production environment, ensuring high availability and performance. You will monitor application health using various monitoring tools, troubleshoot issues in real\\-time, and implement fixes to minimize downtime. Deploying and managing applications within Kubernetes clusters will be a key aspect of your role, requiring familiarity with containerized environments. Collaborating with development teams to implement software updates, patches, and enhancements is vital to maintaining system integrity. You will also be responsible for documenting incidents, creating knowledge base articles, and contributing to process improvements. Ensuring security best practices and compliance standards are adhered to during all operations will be an ongoing priority.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Persistent Systems offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees' well\\-being and professional growth. Employees enjoy a competitive salary along with benefits such as health insurance, including group term life, personal accident, and Mediclaim hospitalization coverage for themselves and their immediate family members. The company promotes a culture of continuous learning by sponsoring higher education, certifications, and quarterly growth opportunities. Employees can participate in various engagement initiatives, including project parties, flexible work hours, and Long Service awards. Annual health check\\-ups and wellness programs are provided to ensure physical and mental health. Persistent Systems is committed to fostering a supportive environment where talent development and innovation are prioritized.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity (in last)
   

  

 Persistent Systems is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We welcome applications from all qualified individuals, regardless of gender, gender identity, disability, ethnicity, or background. We support flexible working arrangements, including hybrid work and accommodations for employees with disabilities, and ensure our facilities are accessible and inclusive. If you have specific requirements or need assistance during the application process or employment, please inform us. Our goal is to provide an equitable environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to our collective success.
   

  

 Let's unleash your full potential at Persistent Systems.
   

  

 "Persistent is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind."

title: Verification Engineer - RISC-V/SoC
description:
**Description**
**Job Title :**
 Senior / Mid\\-Level Verification Engineer \\- RISC\\-V SoC
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a Verification Engineer to strengthen our RISC\\-V verification capability. In this role, you will extend existing verification environments, ensure functional correctness of cache and cluster designs, and contribute to formal and emulation\\-based verification.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Extend and maintain the existing RISC\\-V verification environment.
* Verify cluster and cache subsystems against defined verification targets.
* Perform formal verification, focusing on cache coherence properties.
* Develop and support emulation platforms that boot Linux and run agreed AI applications.
* Work closely with design teams to identify, debug, and close functional issues.
* Contribute to verification planning, coverage, and sign\\-off activities.


**Required Skills \\& Experience**
* Strong experience in digital verification methodologies.
* Experience with SystemVerilog and verification environments.
* Understanding of cache architectures and coherence behavior.
* Experience with formal verification techniques.
* Ability to debug complex SoC\\-level issues.


**Preferred Skills**
* RISC\\-V verification experience.
* Emulation or FPGA\\-based verification exposure.
* Linux bring\\-up or system\\-level validation experience.


**What We Offer**
* Work on advanced RISC\\-V platforms and real\\-world workloads.
* Flexible employment models (permanent or contract).
* Exposure to full verification flow from block to system level.

title: Senior Engineer - Compiler Development
description:
**Description**
 As part of our mission to democratize neurotechnology, we are seeking a Senior Engineer \\- Compiler Development to lead the design of performance\\-critical, low\\-level system software that sits close to our hardware stack and powers real\\-time BrainComputer Interface (BCI) applications.
   

  

 This role is ideal for someone who has deep expertise in C\\+\\+ systems programming, OS/kernel fundamentals, compiler/toolchain awareness, and hardwaresoftware integration, and who thrives at the intersection of neuroscience, embedded systems, and scalable real\\-time computing.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As Senior Engineer \\- Compiler Development, you will architect, implement, and optimize the core system layer from device drivers and real\\-time data pipelines to system services and API abstractions.
   

  

**You Will Work Across**
* Compiler and toolchain optimization
* OS\\-level and kernel subsystems
* Real\\-time signal acquisition
* High\\-performance C\\+\\+ runtimes
* Embedded and edge\\-level architectures


 You will provide strong technical leadership, mentor engineering teams, and collaborate closely with hardware, firmware, algorithms, and AI researchers.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* System Architecture \\& OS\\-Level Design:


 Architect modular, extensible system frameworks that interface directly with hardware and firmware.
   

  

 Define low\\-level hardware/firmware/kernel/driver/API interfaces.
   

  

 Make critical architectural decisions balancing latency, throughput, and reliability.
   

  

 Drive compiler/toolchain optimization strategies for performance\\-critical paths.
   

  

* Core Low\\-Level Development:


 Develop high\\-performance C\\+\\+14/17/20 system components with a focus on :
   

  

* Low\\-latency, real\\-time execution
* Multi\\-threading, synchronization, lock\\-free structures
* Memory management, allocation strategies, and cache efficiency


**Implement**
* Device drivers
* Communication protocols
* Real\\-time signal acquisition and streaming pipelines
* Build OS\\-level abstractions and libraries that expose hardware capabilities to higher\\-level SDKs.
* HardwareSoftware \\& Kernel Integration :
* Collaborate with hardware teams on embedded interfaces and sensor data pipelines.


**Optimize Software Performance On**
* Embedded Linux
* RTOS environments
* FPGAs and edge processors
* Work with kernel subsystems, interrupts, I/O scheduling, and low\\-level performance tuning.
* Performance, Profiling \\& Reliability :
* Profile and optimize systems across CPU/GPU/accelerator architectures.
* Use tools such as: gdb, perf, valgrind, ltrace/strace, eBPF.
* Implement production\\-grade reliability, fault\\-tolerance, recovery, and watchdog mechanisms.
* Leadership \\& Mentorship :
* Define engineering standards, best practices, and system\\-level design docs.
* Mentor engineers in C\\+\\+, systems programming, compiler\\-level thinking, and performance engineering.
* Research \\& Innovation Alignment :


**Stay Current With Cutting\\-edge Work In**
* OS internals and real\\-time computing
* Compiler optimizations (LLVM, Clang, GCC)
* High\\-performance systems programming
* Translate algorithmic and neural\\-signal research into efficient runtime :


**Education**
* Masters in Computer Science/Engineering or related field.
* Exceptional Bachelors candidates may be considered.


**Experience**
* 9\\+ years in system\\-level C\\+\\+ development, including OS\\-level, kernel, or compiler\\-adjacent work.
* Proven track record building complex, production\\-grade low\\-level systems.


**Core Technical Skills**
* Expert C\\+\\+ (C\\+\\+14/17/20\\): STL, templates, design patterns, metaprogramming.


**Strong Understanding Of**
* Multi\\-threading \\& concurrency
* Lock\\-free design and synchronization
* Memory models, allocators, and performance tuning


**Experience With**
* Linux Kernel development, device drivers, system calls, interrupts
* Embedded Linux or RTOS
* Firmware interfaces, hardware bring\\-up
* Familiarity with toolchains and compilers (LLVM, Clang, GCC).
* Strong debugging and profiling chops (gdb, perf, valgrind, sanitizers).
* Experience with streaming, real\\-time signal processing, or high\\-frequency data acquisition.


**Bonus / Good To Have**
* GPU programming (CUDA, OpenCL, Vulkan compute).
* Rust or Python integration with C\\+\\+ pipelines.
* Experience in neurotech, robotics, IoT, or any real\\-time hardware domain.
* Knowledge of DSP, numerical methods, or ML\\-based signal processing.


**Soft Skills**
* Strong systems thinking and ability to understand large, complex architectures.
* Exceptional problem\\-solving under tight latency/performance requirements.
* Cross\\-functional collaboration with hardware, AI, and product teams.
* Excellent communicator who documents clearly and leads by example.

title: Salesforce Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Tech USA is a leading technology solutions provider committed to delivering innovative and tailored software solutions to clients across various industries. With a focus on leveraging cutting\\-edge cloud technologies, Tech USA specializes in Salesforce development, enterprise integration, and digital transformation initiatives. Our team of highly skilled professionals is dedicated to driving business success through scalable, efficient, and secure technology solutions. We foster a collaborative and dynamic work environment that encourages continuous learning and professional growth, ensuring our employees stay at the forefront of technological advancements.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and talented Salesforce Software Engineer to join our dynamic team at Tech USA. In this role, you will be responsible for developing, enhancing, and maintaining Salesforce applications, with a particular emphasis on Experience Cloud and Service Cloud. You will work across multiple clouds and applications, including Sales Cloud, Community, MavenLink, and MuleSoft, to deliver innovative solutions that meet our clients‚Äô business needs. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Salesforce development, experience with cloud integrations, and a passion for clean, efficient code following best practices and enterprise standards.
   

  

 You will own entire development solutions, from requirement gathering and design to deployment and support. Collaborating closely with product owners, business analysts, and other stakeholders, you will ensure the delivery of high\\-quality features and functionalities. Your role will involve code reviews, troubleshooting complex integrations, managing large data feeds, and implementing new features within an agile environment. You will also be instrumental in automating processes and improving existing functionalities to optimize platform performance and user experience.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Proven experience with Salesforce platforms, including Experience Cloud, Service Cloud, and Portals.
* Strong knowledge of Salesforce development lifecycle, best practices, and automation tools.
* Solid understanding of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) and Functional Programming principles.
* Proficiency in Apex, JavaScript, Python, and related programming languages.

* Hands\\-on experience with MuleSoft, Platform Events, Lightning Web Components (LWC), Live Chat, Einstein Bot, and Omni Channel.
* Familiarity with version control systems such as Git and project management tools like JIRA and Atlassian suite.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex integrations and large data volumes.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, capable of effectively collaborating with cross\\-functional teams and stakeholders.
* Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and deliver results within tight deadlines.
* Experience in Agile development methodologies.


**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, test, and deploy Salesforce applications, ensuring adherence to best practices and enterprise standards.
* Build and customize solutions on Salesforce clouds, including Experience Cloud, Service Cloud, and other integrated applications.
* Collaborate with product owners and business teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
* Participate in code reviews, maintain code quality, and implement improvements for existing functionalities.
* Develop and maintain integrations with external systems using MuleSoft and other APIs.
* Configure and optimize Salesforce features such as Live Chat, Einstein Bots, and Omni Channel for enhanced customer engagement.
* Manage data feeds, perform data modeling, and ensure data integrity across platforms.
* Provide ongoing support, incident management, and troubleshooting for Salesforce applications.
* Automate deployment processes and maintain documentation for developed solutions.
* Stay updated on the latest Salesforce features and industry best practices, continuously enhancing technical skills and platform knowledge.
* Bridge the gap between development and business teams by providing technical insights and recommendations.


**Benefits**
 At Tech USA, we believe in supporting our employees' professional growth and well\\-being. We offer competitive compensation packages, comprehensive health insurance, and retirement plans. Our employees enjoy flexible working arrangements, ongoing training opportunities, and access to cutting\\-edge tools and technologies. We foster a collaborative environment that encourages innovation, teamwork, and continuous learning. Additionally, employees benefit from a supportive work culture that values diversity, inclusion, and work\\-life balance, ensuring a fulfilling career experience.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Tech USA is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all employees and applicants are treated with respect and fairness. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other protected characteristic. Our goal is to build a diverse workforce that reflects the communities we serve and fosters innovation through varied perspectives and experiences.

title: Quality Assurance Lead - Automation Testing
description:
**Job Title : QA Lead (Manual \\& Automation)**
**Job Description**
 We are looking for a talented QA Lead with experience in mobile/web app testing, who has a keen eye for detail and is also passionate about quality assurance. This QA Lead will play a key role in the team by writing test cases and automation scripts for multiple scenarios in all phases of mobile app and software development. He/She will be responsible for end to end testing of the product (mobile and web app) on various devices.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and execute manual and automated test cases for various software applications.
* Identify and document defects and issues found during testing.
* Collaborate with developers and other stakeholders to ensure high\\-quality products.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest testing methodologies and tools.
* Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards
* Create and maintain detailed test plans, test cases, and testing documentation
* Ensure that the number of crash\\-free mobile app users is \\>99\\.99%
* Find bugs early in the product development lifecycle and report issues.
* Document and communicate the results of the test cases.
* Ensure that the test suite is run weekly on test devices.
* Knowledge of capturing and diagnosing logs for app crashes.
* Troubleshoot and conduct post\\-implementation/post\\-release testing.
* Performance testing and benchmarking.


**Requirements**
* 5\\+ years of professional experience in mobile app and software testing
* Strong understanding of software development and testing methodologies
* Experience with manual and automated testing tools such as Selenium, Appium, JUnit, etc.
* Experience with test case management tools such as TestRail, Jira, etc.
* Experience with SQL and database management
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in a fast\\-paced environment
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills
* Possess good exposure on Functional, Integration, Installation, Upgrade, Compatibility, GUI, Smoke,


 Accessibility, Ad hoc, and Regression testing. And also well versed with Persona\\-based testing.
   

  

* Experience with Git and version control

title: Technical Lead
description:
IDP Education Limited
   

  

**About The Company**
 IDP Education Limited is an ASX listed company that is 50% owned by 38 Australian universities and headquartered in Melbourne, Australia.
   

  

 For over 50 years our global network of 93 offices has been helping students to achieve their goals through studying abroad.
   

  

 For more than 5,000 employees in more than 50 countries. FY22 Revenue ‚Äì 720 million dollar enterprise making dreams come true of aspirations.
   

  

 We have our IDP Digital campus in DLF IT Park(5th \\& 6th floors , Block 1B), Chennai.
   

  

 https://www.idp.com/india/
   

  

 Digital Campus : https://youtu.be/aV8p2Fjj0Ro
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Deliverables
   

  

* Your code is elegant. You make the complex seem straightforward. You know how to write efficient code that someone else can pick up with ease. You instinctively test your own code and people know they can rely on you, and everything you produce.
* You‚Äôre experienced in Python. You know the difference between scripting and programming in Python
* You know how to adapt patterns and utilize these across your development. If you identify an opportunity to improve a pattern you are confident in how to relay this. You know the difference between an improvement and just another way of achieving the same outcome.


 Take responsibility for Outcomes
   

  

* While a significant part of your role will be to write code in Python and utilize AWS services, the real value you‚Äôll produce will be from really understanding the Outcome required by the Business, and ‚Äúmaking it so‚Äù. We‚Äôre looking for everyone in our team to demonstrate leadership, working together to continuously improve the way we work, and work smarter not harder and continuously increase the value we provide to the business. You‚Äôll be part of this.
* You love technology, are continuously learning and extending your knowledge of best practice and the business value of technology innovations.
* Build, lead and serve an effective team of engineers through hiring, coaching, mentoring, giving feedback through code reviews and hands\\-on development for engineers.
* Suggest the best advanced coding concepts and influence the team to follow.
* Be responsible for the technical design and influence the solution design and architecture of our stack.
* Implement the best practices and coding standards for the project.
* Lead efforts to identify and remove bottlenecks in the development lifecycle, introduce metrics\\-driven improvements, and enable developers to focus on high\\-value coding and innovation.
* Must have extensive knowledge in project designing too, in order to involve with the designing team.
* Is flexible enough and adaptable to the changing and varied work settings.
* Must be completely aware of all the technologies thoroughly especially the ones associated with the software or application which is under construction.
* Evaluate the team‚Äôs work processes and best practices and implement changes to streamline operations iteratively.
* Help other team members grow as engineers by performing code review and mentoring.
* Improve internal team processes by keeping what's working and throwing away what's not.


**What We're Looking For**
* Bachelor's or master‚Äôs in software engineering, Computer Science, or other relevant disciplines.
* At least 7\\+ overall years of experience as a Back\\-end or Full\\-Stack Developer with min 4\\+years of experience in python
* Working knowledge of OOPS concepts.
* Strong Knowledge in Python v3\\.x Language
* Experience in REST APIs with JSON and Swagger
* Hands on experience with Microservices model.
* Hands\\-on in using AWS Services (Lambda, API Gateway, CloudWatch, Queues, Topics, etc) would be preferrable
* Any DB knowledge
* Knowledge in implementing Terraform is an added advantage
* Knowledge on Sumo Logic or Splunk log aggregation is an added advantage.
